item.title: Love beyond language
item.description: Frederick the Great of Prussia, a man of accomplishments in both political and intellectual, having a cruel childhood turned to the companionship of his pet dogs for comfort.

item.title: Week X of quarantine
item.description: COVID 19 hit us like a drunk driver and spread around the world, causing a global pandemic, before we could say knife.
